We were waiting outside when the doors finally opened a little after 9.  We had a big day planned so a big breakfast was perfect.  Based on previous reviews of the restaurant we knew what we wanted to order.  Eggs Benedict and Huevos Rancheros.Eggs Benedict is my most favorite breakfast and have eaten many in my life.  This is a very good Eggs Benedict.  Not my best Eggs Benedict but the bar is pretty high right now.  I would go and order it again.  Quite possibly the best Eggs Benedict in Barcelona.  Hubs had the Huevos Rancheros.  It was also very good.Both were very filling and definitely worth the price.So go here!  and Enjoy!
